data.message: Hello Facebook, I have reported my issue twice and messaged you regarding the same thing. I am trying to deactivate my facebook account. However, whenever I attempt this, I am informed that my password is incorrect, even though I clearly sign into the account using the same password. I would appreciate some assistance in this matter. I will continue to post these messages on your page until this issue is resolved. I look forward to your prompt attention in this matter.

replies.message: Hi Raegan. Can you send us a private message so we can look further into this issue? Thanks! -Ryan
